programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.sub-title: Joue de boeuf et pappardelles maison
programme.desc: Beef cheeks and home-made pappardelle Chuck Hughes cooks tender beef cheeks and home-made pappardelle. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: Ô la belle vie
programme.desc: Sète, a family affair Overlooking the Étang de Thau to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south, Sète is a peninsula open to the world, welcoming men and women from all corners of the Mediterranean down the centuries. A crossroads for trade and historical culture, an inspiring town, vibrant with life! Presented by: Sophie Jovillard.

programme.title: Ricardo
programme.desc:
Chicken lasagne
Classic lasagne with a new twist for this chicken lasagne recipe with cauliflower purée and creamy cheese sauce.
Presented by: Ricardo Larrivée.

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc:
In the land of the Cathars

From the early Middle Ages to the 11th century, only the northern area of France was unified. Further south, Occitanie was a region of local independent seigniories. An era that saw the first crusades, notably the only one led on Christian soil, between Ariège and Aube, to exterminate the Cathars.

Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Painting nature "Painting is all about learning how to look". Persuaded for a long time that "painting wasn't for him", because it was only for talented people, Pierre Zuppiroli only knew how to look, without being able to paint.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Time for sport
Today, Rocky and Lily have been given a very important mission, one that's all about health. They'll be talking about obesity and learning how to fight the disease.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Quelque part quelqu'un
programme.desc:
Paris, 1972. In the midst of the property boom, Raphaëlle, architect, works on renovating old properties and building new blocks of flats in the city. Vincent, financial journalist, is desperately trying to write a book. They attempt to build a relationship but Vincent's alcoholism makes every effort vain...

Directed by: Yannick Bellon (France, 1972)

Cast: Loleh Bellon, Roland Dubillard, Christine Tsingos

Genre: Drama

programme.title: Alex Hugo
programme.desc:
The way of the spirit
Alex saves a young woman from a suicide attempt and discovers that she has been raped. The crime dates back to a week ago, but she has absolutely no memory of it: she had been drugged and attacked by someone during a party where everyone was masked.
Directed by: Muriel Aubin (France, 2020) Screenplay: Julien Guérif Cast: Samuel Le Bihan (Alex Hugo), Lionnel Astier (Angelo Batalla), Mikaël Fitoussi (Renart), Marilyne Canto (Dorval), Fabien Baïardi (Tony Leblanc), Pauline Serieys (Élise) Genre: detective Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: Secrets d'histoire
programme.desc:
Rosa Bonheur, the animal fairy
Rosa Bonheur, French star of the 19th century, known even across the Atlantic, was one of the most talented painters of her time. A free woman with a strong character, she refused the codes that society imposed upon women and frequented the biggest personalities of her era, notably Buffalo Bill.
Presenter: Stéphane Bern.

programme.title: La peinture française autour du monde
5e rang
programme.desc: Episode 20 Paul wants to end his collaboration with Vince and his bosses. Fred gets a dressing down from his boss. Charles and Marie-Luce join forces to make their local councillor see reason concerning the decontamination of their land. Directed by: Francis Leclerc (Canada, 2019) Cast: Maude Guérin (Marie-Luce), Martine Francke (Marie-Louise), Julie Beauchemin (Marie-Christine), Catherine Renaud (Marie-Jeanne), Ève Duranceau (Marie-Paule), Maxime De Cotret (Réginald), Marie-Ève Milot (Julie), Frédéric Pierre (Nicolas), Julie Roussel (Gladys), Julie Du Page (Sophie), François Papineau (Charles) Genre: drama

programme.title: 5e rang
programme.desc: Episode 21 Marie-Luce warns Marie-Jeanne of the danger she's in. Kim is still furious with Julie, will they manage to patch things up and live together peacefully. With Réginald's help, Fred continues his investigation concerning the women who have disappeared and makes some surprising discoveries. Directed by: Francis Leclerc (Canada, 2019) Cast: Maude Guérin (Marie-Luce), Martine Francke (Marie-Louise), Julie Beauchemin (Marie-Christine), Catherine Renaud (Marie-Jeanne), Ève Duranceau (Marie-Paule), Maxime De Cotret (Réginald), Marie-Ève Milot (Julie), Frédéric Pierre (Nicolas), Julie Roussel (Gladys), Julie Du Page (Sophie), François Papineau (Charles) Genre: drama

programme.title: MONTE-CARLO RIVIERA-SAISON 5 (8 ET 9)
programme.desc:
In Corsica, an encounter with the last-remaining producers of Calenzana cheese. Each year, the Principality teaches the youngest about bees and their importance. An opportunity to discover the hives installed in the gardens of Monaco. In New Orleans, behind the scenes of "Romeo and Juliet" by Les Ballets de Monte-Carlo.
Presented by: Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Sur les sentiers de l'histoire
programme.desc:
In the Valley of Mankind

From Montignac-Lascaux to Les Eyzies-de-Tayac, forty short kilometres concentrate an impressive inventory of prehistoric sites. It's here on the banks of the Vézère, in the valley of the same name, that mankind settled and flourished in the Dordogne for a period of 50,000 years.

Directed by: Denis Dommel (France, 2019)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 310 Eliott voit la chance lui sourire. Elsa, quant à elle, va-t-elle capituler et accepter d'aider Virgile ? De son côté, Antonin est contraint de donner le change... Réalisation : Christophe Barbier, Éric Woreth, Chris Nahon (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Aurore Delplace (Johanna), Fred Bianconi (Virgile), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Stéphane Monpetit (Eliott), Hubert Benhamdine (Christophe), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Julie Boulanger (Elsa), Marthe Fieschi (Léa), Teilo Azaïs (Enzo), Maëlle Mietton (Alice) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
